March 11, 1967 D Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Brass Band Championship yorkshire-brass-band-championship-champi-4123
None Yorkshire
Championship
The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK
Contest organised by Yorkshire BBA in protest to National Contest Council stating that all areas use the same test piece in the area contest. Yorkshire qualifying contest held on 26th March at Leeds Town Hall.
9 bands competed.
March 28, 2013, 10:23 p.m. March 28, 2013, 10:48 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Roy Newsome
2 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Trevor Walmsley
3 Grimethorpe Colliery Band George Thompson
4 Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison
